meanings.definition: The action of extending the period of validity of something.
meanings.sent1: The renewals of library books allow you to keep them longer.
meanings.sent2: I need to remember to do my magazine renewals before they expire.
meanings.sent3: The renewals of my gym membership always make me feel like I'm getting a good deal.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like the renewals of sunshine after a rainy day.
meanings.sent5: The renewals of friendship are like planting seeds that grow stronger over time.

meanings.definition: The act of resuming or continuing something.
meanings.sent1: After a break, the renewals of our conversation felt natural.
meanings.sent2: The renewals of the TV show for another season excited the fans.
meanings.sent3: The renewals of the game brought back memories of our childhood.
meanings.sent4: His determination was like the renewals of a never-ending story.
meanings.sent5: The renewals of hope in her eyes were a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The process of making something new again.
meanings.sent1: The renewals of the old building gave it a fresh look.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the renewals of her wardrobe each season.
meanings.sent3: The renewals of the recipe added a modern twist to the dish.
meanings.sent4: The renewals of the garden transformed it into a colorful paradise.
meanings.sent5: His creativity sparked the renewals of ideas in the team.
